credit_line: Museum purchase from Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program Fund
title: Design for the "Ten-Deck House"
provenance: R. Buckminster Fuller; Max Protetch Gallery, New York City
medium: Mimeograph print, brush and blue watercolor on white wove paper
description: Multi-leveled tower-like building supported by cables being dropped into bombed craters depicted in a dynamic and vigorous swooping, diagonal orientation from the upper left to lower right.  Three binder holes along left edge.
name: Print
